pkgmetadata.longdescription: Israel Baby Names 1948-2022 // Israeli baby names provided by Israel's Central Bureau of Statistics. The package contains only names used for at least 5 children in at least one gender and sector ("Jewish", "Muslim", "Christian", "Druze" and "Other"). Data was downloaded from: https://www.cbs.gov.il/he/p ublications/LochutTlushim/2020/%D7%A9%D7%9E%D7%95%D7%AA-%D7%A4% D7%A8%D7%98%D7%99%D7%99%D7%9D.xlsx.
